title: As a Club user I only want to see international amateur players in Quick Search that I have permission to see
custom_preconds:
Visibility Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+-+Profile+Visibility
GIVEN a club user with edit/view permissions for International Amateur player profiles is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN Club user is using quick search to find an International Amateur player profile
custom_expected:
THEN only players that they have permission to see should appear as results
AND what players user has permission to see should be based on attached rules from wiki
BUT BOC users should continue to see all players.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to Elevate a player to L2 Registered
custom_preconds:
Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=possible_l2_registration_listing_-_boc
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=elevate_popup=
Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Level+2+Elevation
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with Intl Ama Reg Admin permissions
AND one or more players that have been selected by an org are displayed in the L2 Possibilities widget
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the L2 Possibilities Widget
custom_expected:
THEN user should see an "Elevate" button for any player on the L2 Possibility widget that has been Selected by any Org(including BOC)
AND clicking "Elevate" should open a pop up, per the provided wireframe 
AND when a date has been added, the "Elevate" button should enable
AND clicking the "Cancel" button should close the pop up and no changes should be made to the player
AND clicking "Elevate" should set the Level 2 Registered date for the player to the date entered in the pop up
AND the pop up should close 
AND if the player was Selected by the BOC, once the player has been Elevated, they should no longer appear in the L2 Possibilities widget
AND if the player was Selected by a Club, the player should continue to appear in the L2 Possibilities widget, and the BOC should continue to be able to add ORGs to their Selection 
AND the "Level 2 Registered" field on the player's profile should read the entered date for all users if the player was selected by BOC
AND the "Level 2 Registered" field on the player's profile should read the entered date ONLY for the BOC and the Selecting Org if the player was not selected by the BOC. It should continue to read "No" for all other Orgs
AND these visibility restrictions should also apply to advanced search
AND the player should be available in the BOC's Level 2 Registered widget with the new elevation date
AND the player should be available in all Clubs' Level 2 Registered widget if the player was selected by the BOC
AND the player should be available only in the BOC and the selecting Org's widget if the player was selected by an Org other than the BOC
AND BOC users should be able to edit the L2 Date on the player profile after elevation. Club users should never have that ability

title: As a BOC user I want to merging 2 profiles to maintain the first Level 1 Registration date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with Intl Ama Reg Admin permissions
AND user navigated to Reg Admin widget 
AND user has selected two player from the Red Admin widget using the check box
AND user has selected which Master records to keep
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Merge"
custom_expected:
THEN Once the profiles have been merged, the player's Level 1 Registration date will be the earliest date that this player was registered, regardless of which player's information is selected as "Master". 

*NOTE TO QA: players can be merged multiple times - all of these merge stories will need to be tested accordingly.*

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_admin
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=player_merge

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Merging+Players+subject+to+Registration

title: As a BOC user I want to merging 2 profiles to maintain originally registered by information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with Intl Ama Reg Admin permissions
AND user navigated to Reg Admin widget 
AND user has selected two player from the Red Admin widget using the check box
AND user has selected which Master records to keep
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Merge"
custom_expected:
THEN Once the profiles have been merged, the "Originally Registered By' will be maintained based on the Org and user that registered the player first, regardless of which player's information is selected as "Master"

*NOTE TO QA: players can be merged multiple times - all of these merge stories will need to be tested accordingly.*

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_admin
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=player_merge

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Merging+Players+subject+to+Registration

title: As a BOC user I want to merging 2 profiles to maintain Scouting Information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with Intl Ama Reg Admin permissions
AND user navigated to Reg Admin widget 
AND user has selected two player from the Red Admin widget using the check box
AND user has selected which Master records to keep
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Merge"
custom_expected:
THEN Once the profiles have been merged, the Scouting Info subsection will be maintained as entered if it exists for only one of the two profiles, regardless of which player's information is selected as "Master"
AND In the unique scenario that this information exists for both profiles selected for merge, then use the information for the player that is specified as the "Master" for the Bio Information

*NOTE TO QA: players can be merged multiple times - all of these merge stories will need to be tested accordingly.*

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_admin
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=player_merge

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Merging+Players+subject+to+Registration

title: As a BOC user I want to merging 2 profiles to maintain any "tags"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with Intl Ama Reg Admin permissions
AND user navigated to Reg Admin widget 
AND user has selected two player from the Red Admin widget using the check box
AND user has selected which Master records to keep
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Merge"
custom_expected:
THEN Once the profiles have been merged, the profile should display as having been "registered by" any Org that registered or added to their Club Reg List either of the two profiles that were merged. 
  * Example: Player 1 was Registered by BOC, and added to Club Reg List by ARI, BOS and Player 2 was Registered by BOC and added to Club Reg List by MLSB, CIN - after the merge the "new" profile will display as having additional registrations by ARI, BOS, MLSB and CIN - and all of those Orgs will continue to see the player on their Club Reg Lists.

*NOTE TO QA: players can be merged multiple times - all of these merge stories will need to be tested accordingly.*

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_admin
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=player_merge

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Merging+Players+subject+to+Registration

custom_expected:
THEN There should be a "Scouting" Left Navigation option for users that have permission to see the Admin Clipboard. 
AND Opening the Scouting Dashboard should display the Admin Clipboard for those that have permission to view it. 
AND The Admin Clipboard should follow the provided wireframe and data discovery. 
AND The population of this clipboard is covered in follow up stories.

https://s8xnnx.axshare.com/#p=scout_admin_clipboard

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Admin+Clipboard+-+Data+Discovery

custom_preconds: GIVEN a Scouting user is logged
custom_steps: WHEN user click on "Scouting" option on the Left navigation under International tab
custom_expected:
THEN There should be a "Scouting" Left Navigation option for users that have permission to see the Scout Clipboard. 
AND Opening the Scouting Dashboard should display the Scout Clipboard.

title: As a BOC user I want to select 2 International Profiles for merge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in with Mergers Permission for International player
AND user navigates to "Registration Admin widget"
custom_steps: WHEN user selected two profiles in the Reg Admin
custom_expected:
THEN Users with International player mergers permission see a "Merge" button on the Registration Admin widget.
AND When exactly two profiles are selected in the Reg Admin, the "Merge" button is enabled. 
AND Selecting two profiles and clicking "Merge" will prompt the user to confirm the merge, and to select the "Master" information that they wish to keep. See Messages #20
AND See wireframe for layout of/information contained in message. 
AND If one of the profiles selected is an Unregistered profile, then the message will NOT have the option to select Master Information that is not entered in the MLSB profile (like attached files). 
OR If one of the profiles has more than one set of Origin information - use the following hierarchy to determine which Contact Info/Files to show:
 1- Master
 2- BOC
 3 - First Registering Org
 4 - MLSB (should only be used if it is the only available Origin)

*The actual merge is covered in another story*

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_admin
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=player_merge

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to see a list of L2 Investigation Results Requests
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user logs in with permission to see L2 Investigation Results Requests
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "International" dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN There should be an "L2 Inquiries" tab 
AND This tab should appear after the L2 Reg tab. 
AND Opening this tab should display the L2 Investigations Inquiries widget. 
AND This widget should appear at the top of the tab. 
AND The widget will follow the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND The default signing period to view for this widget is the current signing period. This is filter should be set under the filter icon and able to be changed to look at prior signing periods' requests. 
AND The L2 Inquiries tab is only available to users who have permission to see this widget and/or the L2 Drug Test Inquiries widget. 
AND This widget is only visible to users who have permission to see it. 

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_investigation_inquiries

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/L2+Investigations+Inquiry+Widget+%28Baseball+Ops%29+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to see a list of L2 Drug Test Results Requests
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user logs in with permission to see L2 Drug Test Results Requests
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "International" dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN There should be an "L2 Inquiries" tab 
AND This tab should appear after the L2 Reg tab. 
AND Opening this tab should display the L2 Drug Test Inquiries widget. 
AND This widget should appear 2nd on the tab. 
AND The widget will follow the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND The default view for this widget is to display all requests submitted during the current signing period. This filter should be set under the filter icon and able to be changed to look at prior signing periods' requests. 
AND The requests should show based on the Signing Period they were made in, not necessarily the signing period of the player's L2 Registration. 
AND The total number of requests value for a player should span signing periods.
AND The L2 Inquiries tab is only available to users who have permission to see this widget and/or the L2 Investigation Inquiries widget. 
AND This widget is only visible to users who have permission to see it.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_drug_test_inquiries

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/L2+Drug+Test+Inquiries+Widget+%28Labor%29+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a Club user I want to be able to request drug test results for a L2 Registered Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club user logs in with L2 Registered Player permission
custom_steps: WHEN user is on L2 Registration widget
custom_expected:
THEN Club users with the permission to request Drug test results see a "Request" button under the 'Request Drug Test Results' column 
AND Clicking the Request button will enter a request for the requesting Org. The request will appear in the corresponding L2 Drug Test Inquiries widget. 
AND The "Request" button is replaced by the date the results were requested for the relevant player. 
AND Club users that do not have this permission should either not see these columns, or just not see the Request button (either is fine).

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=club_l2_registration_list

AND Clicking the Request button will enter a request for the requesting Org. The request will appear in the corresponding L2 Investigation Inquiries widget. 
AND The "Request" button is replaced by the date the results were requested for the relevant player. 
AND Club users that do not have this permission should either not see these columns, or just not see the Request button (either is fine).

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=club_l2_registration_list

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to enter comments for an L2 Drug Test Results Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in with L2 Drug Test Results Request permission
custom_steps: WHEN user is in L2 Drug Test Results Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN the L2 Drug Test Results widget should have "Comments" bubble for each request.
AND Clicking on the comments bubble will allow the user to enter comments regarding the request.
AND Clicking Save on the popup will save the comments or edits made to the comments. 
AND Clicking Cancel on the popup will cancel the edits to the comments.  
AND These comments are not visible anywhere outside of the widget.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_drug_test_inquiries

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/L2+Drug+Test+Inquiries+Widget+%28Labor%29+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to enter Results Provided for L2 Drug Test Results Requests
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in with L2 Drug Test Results Request permission
custom_steps: WHEN user is in L2 Drug Test Inquiries widget
custom_expected:
THEN the L2 Drug Test Inquiries widget should have checkboxes that allow the user to select one or more rows. 
AND There will also be the ability to Select All by selecting the checkbox in the column header row. 
AND Once at least row has been selected, the "Results Provided" button should enable. 
AND Clicking "Results Provided" will launch a modal, per the wireframe. 
AND The user will have the ability to enter in a date and time.
AND The "Cancel" button will always be available, and clicking Cancel will close the modal and no changes will be made.
AND The "Save" button will only enable once the user has entered a date and time. Clicking "Save" will populate the entered date and time for each row that has been selected on the widget. The modal will close, and the widget will refresh. 
AND A blue notification will appear indicating how many entries were updated. 
AND If an entry that was selected already had an entered date and time, simply overwrite whatever was there before.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=l2_drug_test_inquiries

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/L2+Drug+Test+Inquiries+Widget+%28Labor%29+-+Data+Discovery

title: As an LRD user I want to be able to determine who is alerted when new L2 Drug Test Results Requests are entered
custom_preconds: GIVEN LRD user is logged in with Edit Permissions for L2 Drug Test Results Requests widget
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Emails" under Utilities tab
custom_expected:
THEN user will see a subsection is added to the International portion of the email utility titled "L2 Drug Test Results Requests". 
AND This subsection is ONLY editable by users who have permission to edit the L2 Drug Test Results Requests widget. 
AND This follows the same format  and functionality as any of our other email utilities. (Ability to delete rows, add rows, check off "Send Notificiation" and "Send Failure Notif" options available, etc.).
AND The Email Utility's standard Edit/Save should work for this section as well.

title: As a Club user I want to be prevented from requesting too many results at once
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user logs in with L2 Drug Test Results and L2 Investigation Results permission
custom_steps:
WHEN a Club user attempts to request more than 50 Investigation results in a 24 hour period
OR WHEN a Club user attempts to request more than 50 Drug Test results in a 24 hour period
custom_expected:
THEN fire an error. See Messages #23.

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Level+2+Results+Request

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in
AND user is viewing player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selecting "Investigation" from the Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN the system will check to see if the player has a Pending Investigation. (Either Age or ID is set to Pending). 
AND If yes, display Messages #7.

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+Investigations

GIVEN BOC user is logged in

title: As a user I want to be able to run the All Registered Players List Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC or Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user is in reporting widget
custom_expected:
THEN "All Registered Players" will appear on the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND The category of this report should be "International". 
AND The current year should always be available for the BOC.
AND The current year should ONLY be available for anyone outside of the BOC after the Open All Registration Report system date for the current year. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will continue to use the existing LDAP. 
AND The report will NOT be downloadable to any format other than pdf.
AND The report will include a watermark on each page of the running user's username.

Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Population%2C+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Prompts

Report Security: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Audience+-+Security-+Frequency

title: As a BOC user I want fake players included in the All Registered Players List Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user logs in
AND user is in reporting widget
AND selected "All Registered Players List Report"
custom_steps: WHEN user run "All Registered Players" report
custom_expected:
THEN Each run of the All Registered Players report will include 3 fake players. 
AND The 3 players' names and year of birth are updated each year, and the prior year's values will need to be maintained so that running the report for prior years will still use the correct values. 
AND Running the report will always include the fake players, but their DOB will adjust based on the Org of the user running the report. For this reason, their DOB's need to fall in months with 31 Days. 
AND Running as ARI would be May 1, 2002 and running as BAL would be May 2, 2002, etc.

title: As a BOC user I want to indicate which players should have the # next to their name for the current year
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user updated # next to player name to denote that they are a Cuban born player and subject to additional requirements.
custom_expected: THEN We need a way for these players to be set on the backend or front end and have that pulled into the report.
